refnamediv.refpurpose: Return all the keys of an array

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: array_keys returns the keys, numeric and string, from the input array.
If the optional search_value is specified, then only the keys for that value are returned. Otherwise, all the keys from the input are returned.

example.title: array_keys example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$array = array (0 => 100, "color" => "red");
print_r(array_keys ($array));

$array = array ("blue", "red", "green", "blue", "blue");
print_r(array_keys ($array, "blue"));

$array = array ("color" => array("blue", "red", "green"),
                "size" => array("small", "medium", "large"));
print_r(array_keys ($array));
?>
example.para:
The printout of the program above will be:
Array ( [0] => 0 [1] => color ) Array ( [0] => 0 [1] => 3 [2] => 4 ) Array ( [0] => color [1] => size )
